lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Federal Reserve monetary policy, the Gramm-Rudman-Hollings legislation, the G-6 agreement, and the Baker debt initiative for example all have moved us in the right direction," he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "It is worth reiterating that the Federal Reserve's promotion of price stability is critical to the successful implementation of virtually all of the important ingredients for growth," he told the Eastern Economic Association.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "What is important is that we attempt to maintain healthy returns to capital and adopt policies encouraging genuine economic growth," he said.
